entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
